data.name: Voor De Kroon
data.detailed_description:
Conquer the Netherlands in the 13th century as Floris V. A tumultuous time marked by fighting and betrayal within the borders of the Holy Roman Empire. Fight on foot or horseback alongside your army and command your troops.

Voor de kroon is a medieval wargame.

Main Features


EPIC REAL TIME COMBAT


Voor de kroon features formation based battles with up to 600 units at a time. You can fight on foot or on horseback and issue orders to your army. You can command 5 formations of units at a time.

CONQUER 13TH CENTURY HOLLAND


Manage your settlements and raise an army. You get to conquer 13th century Holland and fight for your kingdom.

DYNAMIC WEATHER AND SEASONS


Thunderstorms, mist and rain. On top of that it will snow in the winter and the trees show autumn colors.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR CHARACTER AND HERALDRY


Customize your heraldry and choose a player character for your campaign.

data.short_description: Conquer the Netherlands in the 13th century as Floris V. A tumultuous time marked by fighting and betrayal within the borders of the Holy Roman Empire. Fight on foot or horseback alongside your army and command your troops.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 or intel Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1650 or AMD Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 or intel Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1660 Super or AMD Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains mass scale bloody violence, deadly diseases and general themes of death in various ways.
